select b.role_id, b.role_code, tl.role_name, tl.ROLE_DESCRIPTION from sys_role_tl tl, sys_role_b b where b.role_id not in (select role_id from sys_user_role where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL,javaType=java.lang.Long}) and tl.role_id = b.role_id and tl.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} and ( b.start_active_date is null or CURRENT_TIMESTAMP>b.start_active_date) and (b.END_ACTIVE_DATE is null or b.END_ACTIVE_DATE>current_timestamp) and b.enable_flag='Y'
and b.role_code like concat('%',concat(#{roleCode},'%'))
and tl.role_name like concat('%',concat(#{roleName},'%'))
order by b.role_id

SELECT ur.sur_id , ur.USER_ID , r.role_id, r.role_code, r.role_name, r.role_description, r.enable_flag, r.end_active_date FROM sys_user_role ur , sys_role_b r LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_role_tl tl ON( r.ROLE_ID = tl.ROLE_ID AND tl.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String} ) WHERE ur.ROLE_ID = r.ROLE_ID AND ur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL,javaType=java.lang.Long} ORDER BY r.role_id
select count(1) from sys_user_role t where t.user_id = #{0} and t.role_id = #{1}

SELECT sur.role_id, sr_tl.role_name FROM sys_user_role sur LEFT OUTER JOIN sys_role_tl sr_tl on (sur.role_id = sr_tl.role_id AND sr_tl.lang = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) left join sys_role_b b on(b.role_id=sur.role_id) WHERE sur.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType = DECIMAL} and (b.END_ACTIVE_DATE IS NULL OR b.END_ACTIVE_DATE>current_timestamp) and (b.start_active_date is null or CURRENT_TIMESTAMP>b.start_active_date ) and b.enable_flag='Y' order by sur.role_id
